metadata.title: CVE-2024-26699 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix array-index-out-of-bounds in dcn35_clkmgr[Why]There is a potential memory access violation whileiterating through array of dcn35 clks.[How]Limit iteration per array size.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
